entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or snow squalls early in the morning. Blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
